entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 p.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then snow and blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
